nodes.text: Fighting-sight was a particular form of highly accurate precognition used by the Aing-Tii, experts in the manipulation of space and time, in battle. Jedi Knight Jacen Solo learned this power during his stay with the Aing-Tii, as part of his five-year journey to study other schools of the Force.

In the novel Fate of the Jedi: Omen, Jysella Horn experiences remarkable advanced precognition while fighting. Cilghal recognizes the sensations in the Force as similar to that of flow-walking, another Aing-Tii time-manipulation power, and assumes it to be flow-walking, having no experience with any other Aing-Tii time-manipulation techniques and no experience with fighting-sight. The power manifested by Horn, however, has no resemblance in its workings the previously established nature of flow-walking, and instead accords with the description of fighting-sight, suggesting Cilghal is mistaken in her identification.
